SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActivateAsynchronousServiceGuard
A guard class to handle the activation of asynchronous services in a BESA agent.
ActivateServiceData
A class to represent the data required for activating a service.
AsynchronousService
An abstract class representing an asynchronous service.
Believes
The Believes interface represents a contract for managing and updating the belief system of a rational agent.
ChangeRationalRoleGuard
A class representing a guard that handles the change of a rational agent's role.
InfoData
The InfoData class extends DataBESA and represents a simple message container for communication between rational agents.
InformationFlowGuard
The InformationFlowGuard class extends GuardBESA and is responsible for handling information flow events in the rational agent framework.
Plan
 
PlanCancelationGuard
A class representing a guard that handles plan cancellation for a rational agent.
PlanExecutionGuard
 
RationalAgent
The RationalAgent class is an abstract class that extends AgentBESA.
RationalRole
The RationalRole class represents a role that an agent can adopt in the Rational Agent framework.
RationalState
RationalState is a class that extends StateBESA, representing the state of a rational agent.
RationalState.TYPE
Enum representing the type of service, either synchronic or async.
Task
Abstract Task class representing a task within a BDI rational agent.
Task.STATE
Enumeration of possible task states.
VoidTask
A class representing a void task that extends the Task class.
